discourse_list.title: Know Your MIP #06: Governance Rewards - Friday, February 19th 18:00 UTC

content.content: What MIP49: Governance Rewards would allow the Maker community to reward MKR holders for locking their MKR tokens in Governance. Come join host @juan for @prose11’s presentation on how this MIP works and the potential benefits and risks to the Maker Protocol.  When 2021-02-19T18:00:00Z  Where  >>> This Zoom link <<< Or by using this: Meeting ID: 876 6679 1903 Passcode: MIPMIP One tap mobile +13017158592,,87666791903#,,,,*094782# US (Washington DC) +13126266799,,87666791903#,,,,*094782# US (Chicago)  Dial by your location         +1 301 715 8592 US (Washington DC)         +1 312 626 6799 US (Chicago)         +1 346 248 7799 US (Houston)         +1 646 558 8656 US (New York)         +1 669 900 9128 US (San Jose)         +1 253 215 8782 US (Tacoma) Meeting ID: 876 6679 1903 Passcode: 094782 Find your local number: https://us02web.zoom.us/u/kehPz09t9i  Read up on the MIP, bring lots of questions and contrarian views and see you there! attn: @amyjung; @Aaron_Bartsch ; @mrabino1  ; @flipflopflapdelegate ; @iammeeoh ; @MakerMan ; @Elihu  ; @Deimos ; @psychonaut ; @SebVentures ; @g_dip ; @Planet_X ; @alexis
